QUOTE: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

QUOTE: There are no short cuts to any place worth going.

QUOTE: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
AUTHOR: Aristotle

QUOTE: Do not go gentle into that good night. Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
AUTHOR: Dylan Thomas

QUOTE: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.

QUOTE: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.

QUOTE: Right or wrong, it's very pleasant to break something from time to time.
AUTHOR: Fyodor Dostoevsky

QUOTE: Someday is not a day of the week.

QUOTE: If you don't risk anything, you risk even more.

QUOTE: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
AUTHOR: Thomas Edison

QUOTE: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
AUTHOR: Albert Camus

QUOTE: An ant on the move does more than a dozing ox.

QUOTE: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says "I'm possible"!

QUOTE: Play is the highest form of research.

QUOTE: The power of imagination makes us infinite.

QUOTE: If people never did silly things, nothing intelligent would ever get done.

QUOTE: Don't watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.

QUOTE: The future is not laid out on a track. It is something that we can decide, and to the extent that we do not violate any known laws of the universe, we can probably make it work the way that we want to.

QUOTE: UNIX is simple. It just takes a genius to understand its simplicity.

QUOTE: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

QUOTE: Never memorize something that you can look up.

QUOTE: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.

QUOTE: We only see what we know.

QUOTE: We may encounter many defeats, but we must not be defeated.

QUOTE: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.

QUOTE: Study the past if you would define the future.

QUOTE: As soon as you have made a thought, laugh at it.

QUOTE: Silence is a source of great strength.

QUOTE: To become learned, each day add something. To become enlightened, each day drop something.

QUOTE: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don’t adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.

QUOTE: You build your character in a certain way, and then your character becomes your destiny

QUOTE: Don’t worry if it doesn’t work right. If everything did, you’d be out of a job.

QUOTE: Give me a lever long enough, and a place to stand, and I will move the Earth.

QUOTE: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.

QUOTE: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

QUOTE: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

QUOTE: Logic will get you from A to Z

QUOTE: Sitting quietly, doing nothing, spring comes. And the grass grows by itself.

QUOTE: Study without reflection is a waste of time. reflection without study is dangerous.

QUOTE: I'd rather be an optimist and a fool than a pessimist and right.

QUOTE: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

QUOTE: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.

QUOTE: The harder I work, the luckier I get.

QUOTE: What matters most is how well you walk through the fire.

QUOTE: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.

QUOTE: Your brain, and your body, once connected together, can do anything.

QUOTE: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.

QUOTE: I know, somehow, that only when it is dark enough can you see the stars.

QUOTE: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.

QUOTE: Arise, Awake and Stop not until the goal is reached.

QUOTE: The best way out is always through.

QUOTE: You should be an monster. Then you should learn to control it.

QUOTE: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

QUOTE: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it

QUOTE: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.

QUOTE: The things you think about determine the quality of your mind.

QUOTE: Nothing, to my way of thinking, is a better proof of a well ordered mind than a man’s ability to stop just where he is and pass some time in his own company.

QUOTE: If what you have seems insufficient to you, then though you possess the world, you will yet be miserable.
AUTHOR: Seneca
